hero.title: folio
hero.name: Donatas Paulauskas
hero.roles: Marketing Specialist, Business Operations Analyst, Automation Enthusiast
hero.description: I help ideas become tangible results, combining business needs, automation, and clear design. My goal is to turn your vision into reality.

services.title: My Approach & Expertise
services.subtitle: Too many boring tasks? We'll turn them into a robot's problem, not yours
services.intro: We create systems that free up people's time and allow them to focus on what matters most.
services.automationDesc: Analyzing current business processes (AS-IS), identifying gaps, and proposing improved TO-BE solutions focused on efficiency and clarity.
services.marketingDesc: Analyzing business needs, structuring functional and non-functional requirements, and ensuring a clear link between business goals and technical solutions.
services.webDevDesc: Designing and implementing automated workflows with Make.com: data transfers, validation, notifications, and system synchronization.
services.crmDesc: Integrating different business tools (forms, email, databases, CRM) into a single, smoothly running system.
services.integrationDesc: Creating clear documentation: BPMN diagrams, process descriptions, automation logic, and solution overviews.
services.dataAnalysisDesc: Analyzing operational data, creating concise reports and insights to support informed decisions.

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.subtitle: Projects I deliver are designed to be practical and efficient.

websiteBuild.overview1: A professional website solution tailored to specific business needs. Every site follows SEO and SEM best practices to be discoverable and attract more visitors.
websiteBuild.overview2: Pages are interactive with the right forms and automations to optimize customer experience and streamline business processes.
websiteBuild.feature1Desc: Built to your requirements so the site matches your business needs and strategy
websiteBuild.feature2Desc: Pages are optimized for search engines to increase visibility and traffic
websiteBuild.feature3Desc: Modern, usable, and visually appealing across devices
websiteBuild.feature4Desc: Forms, bookings, and other flows that automate customer service
websiteBuild.problemWhat: Many businesses lacked a modern, optimized website, resulting in poor online presence and lost opportunities. Manual updates and lack of automation slowed growth.
websiteBuild.problemWho: Small business owners and individuals who needed a professional web presence but lacked technical resources.
websiteBuild.problemRisk: Outdated or missing websites led to lost customers, lower search rankings, and reduced credibility.
websiteBuild.analysisApproach: Analyzed business needs, researched best web practices, and designed a modular, SEO-friendly website template for rapid deployment.
websiteBuild.analysisFinding1: SEO and SEM are critical for visibility
websiteBuild.solutionDesigned: Built a professional, SEO-optimized website template with interactive features, automated forms, and easy content management.
websiteBuild.workflowStep3Text: Implement best practices for search visibility
websiteBuild.workflowStep4Text: Deploy site and automate key processes
websiteBuild.solutionWhy: A modern, automated website increases business credibility, attracts more customers, and reduces manual work for owners.

tools.forms: Form Automation - Contact and booking forms

artifacts.scripts: Automation Scripts - For forms and updates

autoEmails.overview1: An automated email reminder system to notify clients about upcoming reservations, meetings, or services. It reduces no-shows, boosts engagement, and saves admin time.
autoEmails.overview2: Data is pulled from your CRM based on selected criteria; AI generates a personalized message and sends it automatically.
autoEmails.feature1Desc: Emails go out before the reservation time according to your schedule
autoEmails.feature2Desc: Adjust message content by client, service, or timing
autoEmails.feature3Desc: Reminders are generated from real booking data
autoEmails.feature4Desc: Track deliveries and opens to improve communication
autoEmails.problemWhat: Appointment reminders and follow-ups were handled manually, causing missed appointments, inconsistent communication, and significant administrative workload.
autoEmails.problemWho: Reception and admin staff spent time sending reminders, handling reschedules, and following up on missed appointments.
autoEmails.problemRisk: Missed reminders increased no-shows, reducing revenue and lowering customer satisfaction.
autoEmails.analysisApproach: Analyzed appointment flows, identified manual touchpoints, and evaluated integration points with booking and CRM systems. Designed automated reminder and follow-up flows using Make.com and email services.
autoEmails.analysisFinding3: Integration with booking systems reduces manual lookups
autoEmails.solutionDesigned: Implemented an automated email pipeline that pulls booking data, personalizes reminders with AI, schedules sends, and triggers follow-ups based on engagement.
autoEmails.workflowStep1Text: System pulls upcoming bookings from the booking platform
autoEmails.workflowStep2Text: AI personalizes message content based on booking and customer data
autoEmails.workflowStep3Text: Emails are sent and opens/clicks are tracked
autoEmails.workflowStep4Text: No-shows and follow-ups are handled automatically
autoEmails.solutionWhy: Automating reminders reduces no-shows, cuts admin time, and provides timely communication that improves customer experience.
autoEmails.deliverable1: Make.com Scenario - Complete CRM/email automation blueprint
autoEmails.deliverable2: Integration Docs - API and workflow documentation
autoEmails.deliverable3: User Guide - Staff instructions for monitoring and overrides
autoEmails.deliverable4: Email Templates - Brand-customizable reminder & follow-up templates

autoCaptions.problemWhat: Content creators faced a time-consuming workflow: filming videos, writing captions, researching hashtags, designing thumbnails, and scheduling posts manually across multiple platforms. Each step required creative effort but consumed hours that could be spent on actual content creation.
autoCaptions.problemWho: Individual creators and small teams managing social media accounts lacked a tool to streamline the post-production workflow, resulting in inconsistent posting schedules and missed engagement opportunities.
autoCaptions.problemRisk: Without automation, creators either compromised on content frequency (leading to reduced audience engagement) or burned out from repetitive manual tasks (reducing overall content quality).
autoCaptions.analysisApproach: Mapped the entire post-production workflow to identify manual touchpoints. Researched available AI services for caption generation, hashtag recommendations, and scheduling tools. Designed an integrated solution using Make.com as the orchestration platform.
autoCaptions.analysisFinding1: AI can generate contextually relevant captions with high accuracy
autoCaptions.analysisFinding2: Hashtag research can be automated using API-based tools
autoCaptions.analysisFinding3: Multi-platform scheduling reduces manual post creation by 80%+
autoCaptions.analysisFinding4: Templates ensure consistent branding across platforms
autoCaptions.solutionDesigned: Built an automated caption-to-post pipeline that accepts video input, generates AI-powered captions, recommends hashtags based on content analysis, optimizes post timing, and publishes to multiple social platforms in one workflow.
autoCaptions.solutionWhy: Centralized workflow reduces context-switching, AI handles creative repetition freeing human effort for actual content creation, multi-platform support maximizes reach without multiplying manual work.
autoCaptions.resultTime: Per-video post production reduced from 45 min to 5 min
autoCaptions.resultConsistency: Automated posting ensures no missed uploads
autoCaptions.resultQuality: Optimized captions and hashtags increase engagement
autoCaptions.resultReach: One workflow, multiple platforms updated simultaneously
autoCaptions.feature1Desc: AI writes clear, engaging text based on your video
autoCaptions.feature2Desc: Chooses the most relevant hashtags for the topic and audience
autoCaptions.feature3Desc: Set date and time to keep uploads consistent
autoCaptions.feature4Desc: Video with all assets is posted automatically to chosen platforms
autoCaptions.workflowStep1Text: Creator uploads video; AI analyzes content
autoCaptions.workflowStep3Text: Algorithm suggests relevant hashtags for reach

autoCRM.overview1: An automated CRM that eases business processes by keeping customer data up to date and instantly accessible. It prepares daily or weekly reports automatically, reducing manual work and improving decision-making.
autoCRM.overview2: Automation lets the team focus on customer care and growth instead of data admin.
autoCRM.feature1Desc: CRM stays synchronized with your systems so information is always current
autoCRM.feature2Desc: Pull the data you need instantly without digging
autoCRM.feature3Desc: Daily or weekly reports prepared automatically from business rules
autoCRM.feature4Desc: Helps understand customer behavior and needs for better service
autoCRM.problemWhat: The client managed customer data and sales processes manually, leading to errors, delays, and missed opportunities. Reporting was slow and required significant manual effort.
autoCRM.problemWho: Sales and support teams spent excessive time on data entry and report generation, reducing time available for customer engagement and business growth.
autoCRM.problemRisk: Manual processes increased the risk of data loss, inconsistent records, and slow response to business needs, impacting customer satisfaction and revenue.
autoCRM.analysisApproach: Mapped all CRM-related workflows, identified bottlenecks, and evaluated automation tools. Designed a solution using Make.com to integrate data sources and automate reporting.
autoCRM.analysisFinding1: Automated data sync reduces errors and saves time
autoCRM.analysisFinding2: Custom reports can be generated on schedule
autoCRM.solutionDesigned: Built an automated CRM pipeline that syncs customer data, generates scheduled reports, and provides instant access to key business information.
autoCRM.solutionWhy: Automation eliminates manual errors, speeds up business processes, and allows the team to focus on growth and customer relationships.
autoCRM.resultTime: Manual reporting and data entry reduced by 80%
autoCRM.resultEfficiency: Staff can focus on value-added tasks
autoCRM.resultImpact: CRM supports business growth and expansion
autoCRM.workflowStep1Text: CRM automatically updates from all sources
autoCRM.workflowStep3Text: Team can instantly retrieve any customer info
autoCRM.toolCRMDesc: CRM integration, data sync and reporting
autoCRM.deliverable2: Integration docs - API and workflow documentation
autoCRM.deliverable4: Report templates - Customizable for business needs

videoGenerator.overview1: An AI-driven tool that builds a cohesive story from images or clips based on your prompt. Generated assets are stored in a database and merged into a ready-to-publish video for social media.
videoGenerator.feature1Desc: AI images follow the storyline you define
videoGenerator.feature2Desc: Generated visuals or clips are stitched into one video
videoGenerator.feature3Desc: All files are saved for easy reuse and management
videoGenerator.feature4Desc: Final video is optimized for social sharing
videoGenerator.problemWhat: Content creators struggled to quickly turn ideas into engaging videos. Manual editing, asset collection, and publishing were slow and repetitive.
videoGenerator.problemWho: Solo creators and small businesses with limited resources for video production and editing.
videoGenerator.problemRisk: Slow production cycles led to missed trends and reduced audience engagement, limiting growth potential.
videoGenerator.analysisApproach: Mapped the video creation workflow, identified bottlenecks, and researched AI tools for image and video generation. Designed an automated pipeline using Make.com and AI APIs.
videoGenerator.analysisFinding1: AI can generate story-driven images from prompts
videoGenerator.analysisFinding3: Database storage enables easy content reuse
videoGenerator.solutionDesigned: Built an AI-powered pipeline that generates images from prompts, assembles them into videos, stores all assets, and outputs ready-to-publish content.
videoGenerator.workflowStep1Text: AI interprets the story and generates image prompts
videoGenerator.workflowStep2Text: AI creates images for each story step
videoGenerator.workflowStep3Text: Images and clips are combined into a video
videoGenerator.workflowStep4Text: Final video is ready for social media
videoGenerator.solutionWhy: Automation accelerates content creation, reduces manual effort, and enables creators to keep up with trends and audience demand.

tools.imageGenerator: AI Image Generator - Prompt-based image creation
tools.videoAssembly: Video Assembly Tool - Automated video editing

artifacts.integrationDocs: Integration Docs - API and workflow documentation
artifacts.userGuide: User Guide - Video generator usage instructions
artifacts.videoTemplates: Video Templates - Customizable for different stories

testimonialGenerator.overview1: A tool that builds a new page on your site in minutes using an existing template. Whether it's new work, testimonials, or a product, the system drafts copy, uploads visuals, and assembles the page.
testimonialGenerator.overview2: A fast way to add content while keeping a consistent design and professional look.
testimonialGenerator.feature1Desc: Template-driven sentences and descriptions keep content consistent
testimonialGenerator.feature2Desc: Add visuals that are automatically placed on the page
testimonialGenerator.feature3Desc: New pages are generated in minutes without extra coding
testimonialGenerator.feature4Desc: All pages follow the template for a unified, professional style
testimonialGenerator.problemWhat: Businesses struggled to keep their websites updated with fresh testimonials and new content. Manual page creation was slow and inconsistent.
testimonialGenerator.problemWho: Small businesses and agencies lacking technical staff
testimonialGenerator.problemRisk: Outdated testimonials reduce credibility and conversions
testimonialGenerator.analysisApproach: Mapped the publishing workflow and evaluated automation tools
testimonialGenerator.analysisFinding2: AI can generate testimonial text from input
testimonialGenerator.analysisFinding3: Automated image upload streamlines visual content
testimonialGenerator.analysisFinding4: Rapid publishing increases freshness and trust
testimonialGenerator.solutionDesigned: An automated testimonial page generator that accepts feedback, formats testimonials, uploads images, and publishes pages
testimonialGenerator.workflowStep1Text: Client submits testimonial and optional image
testimonialGenerator.workflowStep2Text: AI formats and enhances testimonial text
testimonialGenerator.workflowStep3Text: Image is processed and added to the page
testimonialGenerator.workflowStep4Text: New testimonial page is published instantly
testimonialGenerator.solutionWhy: Automation reduces manual work, ensures consistency, and keeps the site fresh
testimonialGenerator.resultTime: Publishing reduced from days to minutes
testimonialGenerator.resultConsistency: All pages follow the same template

servicePage.heading: Digital Marketing Solutions
servicePage.intro1: We provide effective digital marketing solutions that help businesses grow and reach their target audience. Strategies are data-driven and outcome-focused.
servicePage.intro2: Our services cover SEO, content creation, social media management, and email campaigns to keep your brand visible and competitive.
servicePage.cta: Looking to attract more customers? Our team is ready to help—from SEO to social campaigns. Start today.
servicePage.related1Desc: Gain insight into performance and make data-backed decisions
servicePage.related2Desc: Optimize processes, improve efficiency, and grow
servicePage.related3Desc: A strategic view of budget, investments, and profitability

about.title: Helping People Eliminate Monotony
about.description1: Just because a process 'somehow works' doesn't mean it's the best solution. Most companies don't even realize how much their operations can be simplified and how much time they lose on repetitive tasks.
about.description2: That's why I build automations that take over repetitive work, save time, and allow people to focus on what matters most.

skills.title: Skills
skills.subtitle: Tools and knowledge that turn ideas into working projects
skills.webDevDesc: Basic understanding (HTML/CSS) of how to read, create, and style simple websites.
skills.uiuxDesc: Foundational knowledge of user experience and interface design principles (Figma & Lovable.dev).
skills.marketingDesc: Market analysis, data interpretation with Power BI/Excel, and visual creation with Canva/DALL·E.
skills.automationDesc: Using Make.com tools to create complex scenarios, connect APIs, and convert data.
skills.pythonDesc: Ability to read and understand simple code, basic knowledge of programming logic.
skills.crmDesc: Creating databases according to client business processes and managing information.

resume.title: Resume
resume.subtitle: I'm pursuing a career in automated solutions because I believe technology can free people's time and energy for the most important work. My goal is to help companies operate more efficiently, and in the future, deepen my knowledge in artificial intelligence and robotics.
resume.summaryText: Ambitious international business graduate with hands-on experience in marketing and sales, strategic skills in creating market entry plans, and advanced competencies in no-code automation.
resume.job1Task1: Developed a comprehensive market entry strategy by conducting competition, regulatory, and pricing analysis.
resume.job1Task2: Delivered tailored market entry tactics and advertising plans that contributed to the company's expansion prospects.
resume.job1Task3: Strengthened strategic analysis, data interpretation, and stakeholder presentation skills.
resume.job2Task1: Coordinated social media strategies and project work, increasing digital visibility and engagement.
resume.job2Task2: Improved CRM workflows, enhancing cross-departmental communication.
resume.job2Task3: Gained practical experience in marketing, sales, and customer management.
resume.edu1Description: Specialization in consulting and business growth strategies.

t1.text: He quickly understood our needs and proposed solutions that not only looked great but also worked flawlessly.

t2.text: Working with Donatas was smooth from day one. He didn’t just implement our ideas — he suggested better ones.

t3.text: We needed a quick turnaround and Donatas delivered within days. Efficient, clear, and high quality.

t4.text: Donatas combined technical precision with a creative approach. The result is both professional and highly functional.

t5.text: Donatas knows automation inside out and helped us save a lot of time in daily operations.

t6.text: His ability to adapt design to our brand is outstanding. Everything feels cohesive and professional.
